trans-unit.source: Represents an orthographic projection camera.
trans-unit.target: 代表正視投影照相機。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies an orthogonal projection of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] model to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] visual surface.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別指定的正交投影[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]模型到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]視覺化介面。

trans-unit.source: Like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>, it specifies a position, viewing direction, and "upward" direction.
trans-unit.target: 像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>，它會指定位置中，檢視的方向，以及 「 向上 」 的方向。

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>, however, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera> describes a projection that does not include perspective foreshortening.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PerspectiveCamera>，不過<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>描述不包含透視圖投影。

trans-unit.source: In other words, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera> describes a viewing box whose sides are parallel, instead of one whose sides meet in a point at the scene's horizon.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>描述其兩邊都是平行，而不是一個起點場景的水平滿足其邊緣的檢視方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示正視圖和透視圖相機投影之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: ![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection")
trans-unit.target: ![正視圖和遠近景深投射](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "正視圖和遠近景深投影")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera> and toggle camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>並切換相機投影。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會具現化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> that specifies the camera position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" />，指定相機位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> that specifies the direction of the camera's projection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />，指定相機投影的方向。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> that specifies the upward direction according to the perspective of the onlooker.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />，指定從觀看者看去的向上方向。

trans-unit.source: The width of the camera's viewing box, in world units.
trans-unit.target: 相機檢視方塊的寬度，以全局單位表示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" /> class with the specified position, projection direction, upward direction, and width.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定的位置、投影方向、向上方向和寬度。

trans-unit.source: The following code instantiates an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會具現化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the camera's viewing box, in world units.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相機檢視方塊的寬度，以全局單位表示。

trans-unit.source: Width of the camera's viewing box, in world units.
trans-unit.target: 相機檢視方塊的寬度，以全局單位表示。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera> describes a projection that does not include perspective foreshortening, its viewing box has parallel sides.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>描述不包含檢視方塊的投射 foreshortening，其檢視方塊中含有平行的側邊。

trans-unit.source: The width of the viewing box can therefore be specified with a single value.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可以使用單一值來指定檢視方塊的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the difference between orthographic and perspective-foreshortened camera projections.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示正視圖和透視圖相機投影之間的差異。

trans-unit.source: ![Orthographic and perspective projection](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "Orthographic and perspective projection")
trans-unit.target: ![正視圖和遠近景深投射](~/add/media/camera-projections4.png "正視圖和遠近景深投影")

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera> and sets this property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera>並設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.Width" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.OrthographicCamera.Width" /> 相依性屬性。
